body:
Comment 6: 
the offending test is TestGcSys in pkg/runtime/gc_test.go

in that file, you will find a string constant named testGCSysSource,
could you please copy that to a file, delete the parts enclosed between
"{{" and "}}" and then compile and run the resulting binary with Kaspersky
enabled?

if the test doesn't complete in 2 minutes, but will complete when Kaspersky
is disabled, you might want to report that to Kaspersky.
